title: Boost your confidence with Lilly King - the double Olympic champion swimmer
description:
Mind games are everywhere in sport but swimming offers the chance for reflection like no other sport. Hours spent in the pool every day led to double Lilly King honing some winning mental techniques.

"I like to win the race before it starts."

Find out the story behind the world records, the Yulia Efimova finger wag, and more.
